**战斧**（battle-axe）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")，它使用[斧](/wiki/%E6%96%A7 "斧")技能，由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成。未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，它的外观为**双头斧**（double-headed axe）。

[撕裂者](/index.php?title=%E6%92%95%E8%A3%82%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "撕裂者 (page does not exist)")是一种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类战斧。

[ ]

## 生成

战斧在随机生成武器中占比1%。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时有1⁄2的概率携带一把[+0](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")战斧[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[食人魔](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")类怪物在生成时有概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")战斧：普通的[食人魔](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔 (page does not exist)")为1⁄12，[食人魔领主](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%E9%A2%86%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔领主 (page does not exist)")为1⁄6，[食人魔王](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%E7%8E%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔王 (page does not exist)")为1⁄3[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

具有[强壮](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%BA%E5%A3%AE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "强壮 (page does not exist)")属性，能够持握武器，拥有武器攻击能力，且没有特殊的起始物品生成规则的[人形](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%BA%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "人形 (page does not exist)")怪物在生成时都有概率携带一把战斧（在[Rogue关卡](/index.php?title=Rogue%E5%85%B3%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue关卡 (page does not exist)")中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物是1⁄14，对于[领主](/index.php?title=M2_LORD/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 LORD/zh-CN (page does not exist)")或[恶物](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶物 (page does not exist)")是1⁄12，对于[王族](/index.php?title=M2_PRINCE/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 PRINCE/zh-CN (page does not exist)")或同时为领主和恶物的怪物是1⁄10，对于同时是王族和恶物的怪物是1⁄8[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄116（约0.86%）的概率尝试获得一把战斧。[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有1⁄4的概率被替换为战斧，因此他们生成时获得战斧的总概率是25.6%[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 策略

- *主条目：[双手武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双手武器 (page does not exist)")*

战斧在游戏早期由于高伤害输出而非常实用，对于近战能力较弱的角色是不错的选择，虽然比起[双手剑](/wiki/%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B%E5%89%91 "双手剑")来说要弱一点，但也更轻。此外，战斧和[斧](/wiki/%E6%96%A7 "斧")一样，可以在玩家缺少[开锁工具](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%80%E9%94%81%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "开锁工具 (page does not exist)")时用于破[门](/index.php?title=%E9%97%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "门 (page does not exist)")，而且破坏商店门时会收到特殊的消息并自动停下动作，可以避免意外破坏店门激怒[店主](/index.php?title=%E5%BA%97%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "店主 (page does not exist)")。不过要注意，试图砍[矿坑镇](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矿坑镇 (page does not exist)")的门会立即激怒附近视野内的[警卫员](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员 (page does not exist)")。

如果在持握战斧时它被诅咒了，玩家会无法进行特定的动作，因此大部分玩家在游戏中期后就很少使用战斧。如果你不幸遇到了持握的双手武器被诅咒的情况，你仍然可以使用[倒出](/index.php?title=%E5%80%92%E5%87%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "倒出 (page does not exist)")指令将[容器](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%B9%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "容器 (page does not exist)")里的物品倒到地面上，从而可以使用存放在容器里的物品解除诅咒。

## 历史

战斧最初于[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Battle-axe/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an axe will produce a battle-axe and vice versa.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the Executioner is generated with a [rustproof](/wiki/Rustproof "Rustproof") battle-axe if Cleaver is already generated in the current game.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the battle-axe appears as a **double-bitted axe** when unidentfied. [Dwarven](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") start the game with a +2 battle-axe.

Cleaver is the first sacrifice gift for Barbarians that start the game with a battle-axe. There are a couple of other artifact battle-axes:

- [The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Axe_of_the_Dwarvish_Lords "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful artifact that has +1 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals doubled damage, and grants [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control") and [X-ray vision](/wiki/X-ray_vision "X-ray vision") to dwarves while wielded. The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords can be used as a [digging tool](/wiki/Digging_tool "Digging tool"), and dwarven characters can also throw the artifact and have it always return to their hands.
- [The Heart of Shadow](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Heart_of_Shadow "DNetHack artifacts") is a chaotic [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") that is huge and made of [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian"), and is always generated with the unholy [object property](/wiki/Object_properties#dNetHack "Object properties"). It has +1d20 to-hit and deals +1d10 [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage against targets without [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), and grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") while carried. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") The Heart of Shadow creates [darkness](/index.php?title=Darkness\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Darkness (page does not exist)") around the character.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a battle-axe can be created at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") by combining two axes can be combined to create a battle-axe.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, [Marionette](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\)#Marionette.2C_Puppet_of_Screams "Spirits (dNetHack)") is generated with a battle-axe when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [tortle](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") barbarians receive a [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident") in lieu of the role's two-handed weapon.

A battle-axe is always generated on the first floor of the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm") at level creation.

[Aligned champions](/wiki/Champion_\(monster\) "Champion (monster)") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a battle-axe, and [flinds](/wiki/Flind_\(EvilHack\) "Flind (EvilHack)") have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with a battle-axe. [Geryon](/index.php?title=Geryon_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Geryon (EvilHack) (page does not exist)") is always generated with a cursed battle-axe that has the [shock](/wiki/Shock "Shock") [object property](/wiki/Object_property "Object property").

A battle-axe can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining an axe and a [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword"); a [bardiche](/wiki/Bardiche "Bardiche") can be created at a forge by combining a battle-axe and a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, a battle-axe can be created at a forge by combining two axes, similar to SpliceHack. EvilHack changes to starting inventories also apply.

战斧（battle-axe）是NetHack中的一种武器，它使用斧技能，由铁制成。未鉴定时，它的外观为双头斧（double-headed axe）。

撕裂者是一种神器类战斧。

生成

战斧在随机生成武器中占比1%。

野蛮人在游戏开始时有1⁄2的概率携带一把+0战斧[1][2]。

食人魔类怪物在生成时有概率携带战斧：普通的食人魔为1⁄12，食人魔领主为1⁄6，食人魔王为1⁄3[3]。

具有强壮属性，能够持握武器，拥有武器攻击能力，且没有特殊的起始物品生成规则的人形怪物在生成时都有概率携带一把战斧（在Rogue关卡中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物是1⁄14，对于领主或恶物是1⁄12，对于王族或同时为领主和恶物的怪物是1⁄10，对于同时是王族和恶物的怪物是1⁄8[4]。

所有玩家怪物在生成时有1⁄116（约0.86%）的概率尝试获得一把战斧。野蛮人职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有1⁄4的概率被替换为战斧，因此他们生成时获得战斧的总概率是25.6%[5]。

策略

主条目：双手武器

战斧在游戏早期由于高伤害输出而非常实用，对于近战能力较弱的角色是不错的选择，虽然比起双手剑来说要弱一点，但也更轻。此外，战斧和斧一样，可以在玩家缺少开锁工具时用于破门，而且破坏商店门时会收到特殊的消息并自动停下动作，可以避免意外破坏店门激怒店主。不过要注意，试图砍矿坑镇的门会立即激怒附近视野内的警卫员。

如果在持握战斧时它被诅咒了，玩家会无法进行特定的动作，因此大部分玩家在游戏中期后就很少使用战斧。如果你不幸遇到了持握的双手武器被诅咒的情况，你仍然可以使用倒出指令将容器里的物品倒到地面上，从而可以使用存放在容器里的物品解除诅咒。

历史

战斧最初于NetHack 3.1.0加入游戏。

Variants

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading an axe will produce a battle-axe and vice versa.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the Executioner is generated with a rustproof battle-axe if Cleaver is already generated in the current game.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the battle-axe appears as a double-bitted axe when unidentfied. Dwarven Nobles start the game with a +2 battle-axe.

Cleaver is the first sacrifice gift for Barbarians that start the game with a battle-axe. There are a couple of other artifact battle-axes:

  • The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords is a lawful artifact that has +1 to-hit and deals doubled damage, and grants teleport control and X-ray vision to dwarves while wielded. The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords can be used as a digging tool, and dwarven characters can also throw the artifact and have it always return to their hands.
  • The Heart of Shadow is a chaotic intelligent artifact that is huge and made of obsidian, and is always generated with the unholy object property. It has +1d20 to-hit and deals +1d10 fire damage against targets without fire resistance, and grants magic resistance while carried. Invoking The Heart of Shadow creates darkness around the character.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a battle-axe can be created at a furnace by combining two axes can be combined to create a battle-axe.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Marionette is generated with a battle-axe when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, tortle barbarians receive a trident in lieu of the role's two-handed weapon.

A battle-axe is always generated on the first floor of the Ice Queen's Realm at level creation.

Aligned champions have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a battle-axe, and flinds have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with a battle-axe. Geryon is always generated with a cursed battle-axe that has the shock object property.

A battle-axe can be created at a forge by combining an axe and a broadsword; a bardiche can be created at a forge by combining a battle-axe and a spear.

'''战斧'''（battle-axe）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]，它使用[[斧]]技能，由[[铁]]制成。未[[鉴定]]时，它的外观为'''双头斧'''（double-headed axe）。

[[撕裂者]]是一种[[神器武器|神器]]类战斧。

== 生成 ==
战斧在随机生成武器中占比1%。

[[野蛮人]]在游戏开始时有{{frac|2}}的概率携带一把[[附魔|+0]]战斧{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|44|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|680|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[食人魔（怪物类别）|食人魔]]类怪物在生成时有概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]战斧：普通的[[食人魔]]为{{frac|12}}，[[食人魔领主]]为{{frac|6}}，[[食人魔王]]为{{frac|3}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|434|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

具有[[强壮]]属性，能够持握武器，拥有武器攻击能力，且没有特殊的起始物品生成规则的[[人形]]怪物在生成时都有概率携带一把战斧（在[[Rogue关卡]]中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物是{{frac|14}}，对于[[M2_LORD/zh-CN|领主]]或[[恶物]]是{{frac|12}}，对于[[M2_PRINCE/zh-CN|王族]]或同时为领主和恶物的怪物是{{frac|10}}，对于同时是王族和恶物的怪物是{{frac|8}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|521|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

所有[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有{{frac|116}}（约0.86%）的概率尝试获得一把战斧。[[野蛮人（玩家怪物）|野蛮人]]职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有{{frac|4}}的概率被替换为战斧，因此他们生成时获得战斧的总概率是25.6%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|171|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
{{main/zh-CN|双手武器}}
战斧在游戏早期由于高伤害输出而非常实用，对于近战能力较弱的角色是不错的选择，虽然比起[[双手剑]]来说要弱一点，但也更轻。此外，战斧和[[斧]]一样，可以在玩家缺少[[开锁工具]]时用于破[[门]]，而且破坏商店门时会收到特殊的消息并自动停下动作，可以避免意外破坏店门激怒[[店主]]。不过要注意，试图砍[[矿坑镇]]的门会立即激怒附近视野内的[[警卫员]]。

如果在持握战斧时它被诅咒了，玩家会无法进行特定的动作，因此大部分玩家在游戏中期后就很少使用战斧。如果你不幸遇到了持握的双手武器被诅咒的情况，你仍然可以使用[[倒出]]指令将[[容器]]里的物品倒到地面上，从而可以使用存放在容器里的物品解除诅咒。

== 历史 ==
战斧最初于[[NetHack 3.1.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] an axe will produce a battle-axe and vice versa.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the Executioner is generated with a [[rustproof]] battle-axe if Cleaver is already generated in the current game.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], the battle-axe appears as a '''double-bitted axe''' when unidentfied. [[Dwarf (starting race)|Dwarven]] [[Noble]]s start the game with a +2 battle-axe.

Cleaver is the first sacrifice gift for Barbarians that start the game with a battle-axe. There are a couple of other artifact battle-axes:

* [[dNetHack artifacts#Axe of the Dwarvish Lords|The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords]] is a lawful artifact that has +1 [[to-hit]] and deals doubled damage, and grants [[teleport control]] and [[X-ray vision]] to dwarves while wielded. The Axe of the Dwarvish Lords can be used as a [[digging tool]], and dwarven characters can also throw the artifact and have it always return to their hands.
* [[dNetHack artifacts#The Heart of Shadow|The Heart of Shadow]] is a chaotic [[intelligent artifact]] that is huge and made of [[obsidian]], and is always generated with the unholy [[Object properties#dNetHack|object property]]. It has +1d20 to-hit and deals +1d10 [[fire]] damage against targets without [[fire resistance]], and grants [[magic resistance]] while carried. [[Invoking]] The Heart of Shadow creates [[darkness]] around the character.

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], a battle-axe can be created at a [[furnace]] by combining two axes can be combined to create a battle-axe.

===notdNetHack===
In [[notdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, [[Spirits (dNetHack)#Marionette, Puppet of Screams|Marionette]] is generated with a battle-axe when summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]].

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Tortle (starting race)|tortle]] barbarians receive a [[trident]] in lieu of the role's two-handed weapon.

A battle-axe is always generated on the first floor of the [[Ice Queen's Realm]] at level creation.

[[Champion (monster)|Aligned champions]] have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with a battle-axe, and [[Flind (EvilHack)|flinds]] have a {{frac|2|3}} chance of generating with a battle-axe. [[Geryon (EvilHack)|Geryon]] is always generated with a cursed battle-axe that has the [[shock]] [[object property]].

A battle-axe can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining an axe and a [[broadsword]]; a [[bardiche]] can be created at a forge by combining a battle-axe and a [[spear]].

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, a battle-axe can be created at a forge by combining two axes, similar to SpliceHack. EvilHack changes to starting inventories also apply.
